name: Password Pad Lite Document
summary: Learn about .PWDPL files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: Password Pad Lite is the free version of Password Pad. However, it does not use as strong of an encryption scheme as the paid version, which stores encrypted documents using the .PWDP extension. Therefore, your information is encrypted more securely with the paid version.

description: Password-protected document created by Password Pad Lite, a text editor that incorporates "lite" encryption; stores encrypted document content so that the document can only be viewed with the correct password; used for saving sensitive personal information.
